articles.author: Simon Abrams
articles.title: Ponniyin Selvan: Part II movie review (2023) - Roger Ebert
articles.description: Ratnam and his collaborators stick the landing on their gargantuan pot-boiler, and while Krishnamurthy’s world may not look as grand as it seemed, either in the moviemakers’ heads or on the page, it is big enough to get lost in.
